charges.charge_description: 18:1341 FRAUDS AND SWINDLES POSTAL, INTERSTATE WIRE, RADIO, ETC. (1-4)

charges.charge_disposition: The dft pleaded guilty to counts 1,2,3, &; 4 of the information. The dft is hereby placed on probation for a term of (5) five years. The dft shall comply with the following additional conditions: That the dft Leonard Bulla serve (6) months home detention; and that the dft Leonard Bulla be barred from any form of telemarketing work; if so he will be in violation of his probation. It is ordered that he dft shall pay a special assessment of $200.00, for counts 1,2,3,&; 4, which shall be due immediately. (1-4)

charges.charge_description: 18:1341 FRAUDS AND SWINDLES POSTAL, INTERSTATE WIRE, RADIO, ETC. (1-3)

charges.charge_disposition: The dft pleaded guilty to counts 1,2,&; 3 of the information. The dft is hereby placed on probation for a term of (3) three years; a special condition of probation is that the dft Joseph Bartosik serve (6) six months home detention. It is ordered that the dft shall pay a special assessment of $150.00, for counts 1,2,&; 3, which shall be due immediately. (1-3)

charges.charge_description: 18:1341 FRAUDS AND SWINDLES POSTAL, INTERSTATE WIRE, RADIO, ETC. (4)

charges.charge_disposition: On govt's motion all open counts are dismissed. (4)

charges.charge_description: 18:1341 FRAUDS AND SWINDLES POSTAL, INTERSTATE WIRE, RADIO, ETC. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The dft pleaded guilty to count one of an information The dft is hereby placed on probation for a term of three (3) years on count 1 and to serve six (6) months in home detention. It is ordered that the dft shall pay a special assessment of $50.00, for count one (1), which shall be due immediately. Counts 2, 3, &; 4 are dismissed on the motion of the United States. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:1341 FRAUDS AND SWINDLES POSTAL, INTERSTATE WIRE, RADIO, ETC. (2-4)

charges.charge_disposition: On govt's motion all open counts are dismissed (2-4)

charges.charge_description: 18:1341 FRAUDS AND SWINDLES POSTAL, INTERSTATE WIRE, RADIO, ETC. (1-2)

charges.charge_disposition: The Dft pleaded guilty to count one (1) and two (2) of an information. The dft is hereby placed on probation for a term of three (3) years on counts 1 &; 2 and to serve six (6) months in home detention. It is ordered that the dft shall pay a special assessment of $100.00. for counts 1 &; 2, which shall be due immediately. Counts 3 &; 4 are dismissed on the motion of the United States. (1-2)
